body_html:
You are right, the custom dependencies for custom ops can be confusing.
I think ultimately, we would move to distributing TF using RPM/DEB packages and also provide tools maybe not makefile but some tools to build custom ops easier.
But until then, this may work.

Its existence in the core API, I dont know.
Ill let API owners to decide on that.

I think ultimately, we would move to distributing TF using RPM/DEB packages and also provide tools maybe not makefile but some tools to build custom ops easier.

Ill let API owners to decide on that.
body:
You are right, the custom dependencies for custom ops can be confusing.
I think ultimately, we would move to distributing TF using RPM/DEB packages and also provide tools maybe not makefile but some tools to build custom ops easier.
But until then, this may work.

Its existence in the core API, I dont know.
Ill let API owners to decide on that.
